attributes.action: Reflect the danger to pedestrians and other road users by treating large 4x4 vehicles as goods vehicles - EG Reduce speed limits / restrict road access / prevent use of 3rd lane of  Motorway etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
4x4's are a necessity in the rural area in which I live. Therefore, I do not advocate raising taxes to discourage ownership.

However, on the road, they are a hazard for pedestrians and other road users, so I believe that they need to be slowed down and restricted from using certain roads in the same way that large van and lorries are.

This would also help to reduce the excess fuel that now needs to be treated as a scarce resource.
